body_html: @skye Sure I can take a look at whether it's possible to remove enum from TensorFlow. There are quite a few places using it. I'm not yet sure whether Enum type is exposed to the public API yet. If not then it'll be relatively straightforward, otherwise it'll be either infeasible or need to involve deprecation processes.

body: @skye Sure I can take a look at whether it's possible to remove `enum` from TensorFlow. There are quite a few places using it. I'm not yet sure whether Enum type is exposed to the public API yet. If not then it'll be relatively straightforward, otherwise it'll be either infeasible or need to involve deprecation processes.
